about_the_game:
In the free-to-play shooter game BLACK STIGMA, you as a killer have to take down enemies and complete missions. You may be tasked with eliminating all your opponents or fighting to secure cash for your organization.

Collect and play characters that match your style and objectives. The various firearms players will have access to can also have their features and abilities modified to your taste.




The Masters each have a different background, appearance, and combat style. Shooting verses melee combat and mobility verses toughness—the masters show aptitude in different areas.

More Masters with new combat mechanisms will be added as our universe expands.




Explore the different combat options. Make precise shots from a mid/long-range distance, mix shooting and martial arts at close range, or fire shotgun shells to blow everyone away.

Choose among the various combat tactics and become the star of your own action movie.




It's boring to choose from a small number of weapons. Explore the various firearm modification options that range from practical upgrades like scopes and magazines to decorative upgrades like shape and color.

Participate in battle with your very own gun.




We invite you to a world of conflict and struggle between contract-killing organizations. The Masters, who live in disguise, showcase different combat abilities that fit their undercover occupations. Join other Masters and enjoy the various game modes. New Masters, maps, and modes will be unlocked as the story progresses.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: BLACK STIGMA is a hero shooter game with a diverse cast of characters. You can choose and customize a handgun of your preference and upgrade your character's abilities in different ways. Play as your ideal killer character, from long-range precision shots to close-range brawls.
supported_languages: English, Korean, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Thai, Turkish, Russian, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America
